Name: Wind Angel Challenge
About the game: Wind Angel Challenge is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the universe. The game is a sequel to the 'Wind Angel' series. In this game, players can only challenge bosses, and each level is a different boss. [Game Control] Players can control the game through keyboard, keyboard + mouse or gamepad. [Game Features] Players will get diamonds when they damage or defeat enemies, and diamonds can be used to strengthen and upgrade. Enhanced attack: Each enhancement can add a type of bullet, and the more enhancements, the stronger the power. Enhanced attack speed: It can increase the shooting speed of the protagonist in battle. Strengthen Life: Increase the life of the protagonist fighter. Players can also set up different wingmen to fight with the protagonist fighter.
